title: Leblanc attacking voices removed?

replies.body: I want everything for LeBlancs voice back, everything plz

As a LeBlanc main, it has been bugging me big time as well. From her missing casting ability voice over (Sigil of Malice, Distortion, Ethereal Chains, Mimic) to her death sounds both LeBlanc and her clone to this new implemented summoner spell {{summoner:4}} like sound when reactivating both Distortion and the mimic version. You can say that she just got Sigil'd of Silence :P

I hope Riot can fix this. I think it might be working as intended though in Riot's part because for Elderwood LeBlanc and Ravenborn LeBlanc, I think it would be better for her to not say her lines and just have the ability's sound play on its own. But then again, classic LeBlanc is much more noisier.

Edit: and as you stated, she is also missing some of her movement and attacking quotes.

Also, I feel like the implementation of these skins made these bugs exist.

> [{quoted}](name=SylvanasWrunner,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=1EwtgiWb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-09T02:15:46.150+0000)
>
> As a LeBlanc main, it has been bugging me big time as well. From her missing casting ability voice over (Sigil of Malice, Distortion, Ethereal Chains, Mimic) to her death sounds both LeBlanc and her clone to this new implemented summoner spell {{summoner:4}} like sound when reactivating both Distortion and the mimic version. You can say that she just got Sigil'd of Silence :P
> 
> I hope Riot can fix this. I think it might be working as intended though on Riot's part because for Elderwood LeBlanc and Ravenborn LeBlanc, I think it would be better for her to not say her lines and just have the ability's sound play on its own. But then again, classic LeBlanc is much more noisier.
> 
> Edit: and as you stated, she is also missing some of her movement and attacking quotes.
> 
> Also, I feel like the implementation of these skins made these bugs exist.

Why do you think it's better for those two particular skins not to have lines?

Because they have a different/unique sound effect on their own and for them to be fully heard, LeBlanc doesn't get to say her casting ability voice lines. Honestly though they should just add it back :)

Also keep in mind that these two new skins of hers are the only ones with completely new stuff going on as Prestigious, WIcked, and I don't even know why ''Mistletoe'' have the same thing going on with classic.
She is going to get a Ryze level Visual & Gameplay update in the ''near future'' so you don't have to worry about that. Probably even the voice will be changed

> [{quoted}](name=DoflamingoGT,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=1EwtgiWb,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-07-09T13:56:22.781+0000)
>
> She is going to get a Ryze level Visual & Gameplay update in the ''near future'' so you don't have to worry about that. Probably even the voice will be changed

Source??
